items.title: The interoperability breakthrough: How MCP is becoming enterprise AI’s universal language
items.description: Just a few months after it's release, MCP adoption is growing. VentureBeat spoke to some enterprises asking why MCP is winning the standards race.

items.title: Guardian agents: New approach could reduce AI hallucinations to below 1%
items.description: There are lots of ways to detect AI hallucination, new guardian agent model promises to correct them.

items.title: Sakana introduces new AI architecture, ‘Continuous Thought Machines’ to make models reason with less guidance — like human brains
items.description: While the CTM shows strong promise, it is still primarily a research architecture and is not yet production-ready out of the box.

items.title: OpenAI just fixed ChatGPT’s most annoying business problem: meet the PDF export that changes everything
items.description: OpenAI has added a powerful PDF export feature to its Deep Research tool, signaling a major push into enterprise AI and transforming how businesses ge...

items.title: New fully open source vision encoder OpenVision arrives to improve on OpenAI’s Clip, Google’s SigLIP
items.description: A vision encoder is a necessary component for allowing many leading LLMs to be able to work with images uploaded by users.
